item.title: Your Love Life on Ozempic
item.description: Beyond treating diabetes and helping people lose weight, GLP-1s may also improve libido. But the reasons are as complex as desire itself.

item.title: The Heart Emoji Is Meaningless
item.description: Once reserved for romantic partners and other loved ones, the heart emoji can now mean anything—which means it has no meaning at all.
